hero.headline: Your land, understood.
hero.subtitle: The bioregional platform that gives landowners a living digital profile of their property — combining what you know with what's publicly available.
hero.description: The solutions to land degradation already exist. The next step is documented knowledge — local to global.

land.title: Your Land
land.description: Contribute what you know. We'll build on it with open data from satellites, soil surveys, and weather records.

bioregion.title: Your Bioregion
bioregion.description: Understand the ecological context of your property — the living systems, species, and natural rhythms that define your region.

seasons.title: Your Seasons
seasons.description: Know what to expect and when to act. Seasonal insights tailored to your land's location, climate, and bioregion.

step1.title: Tell us about your land
step1.description: Walk through a guided intake that captures your property's story — from soil to species.

step2.title: We enrich it with open data
step2.description: We pull in satellite imagery, weather data, soil surveys, and bioregion classification — automatically.

step3.title: Get your Land Passport
step3.description: A living profile page that combines your knowledge with public data into one shareable document.

cta.title: Your land has a story.
cta.subtitle: Help us build the world's most comprehensive bioregional knowledge base — starting with your property.

onboarding.title: Contribute Your Land
onboarding.subtitle: Tell us about your property. This takes about 10 minutes.

propertyInfo.title: Property Information
propertyInfo.subtitle: Let's start with the basics.
propertyInfo.ownerEmailHelp: We'll send you a private link to edit your passport later.

location.title: Location
location.subtitle: Where is your property?
location.clickMap: Or click on the map to place a pin

landUse.title: Land Use
landUse.subtitle: What's currently on your land?
landUse.descriptionLabel: Tell us more about how the land is used
landUse.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g. Mostly cork oak forest with olive groves on the south slope...

soil.title: Soil Data
soil.subtitle: What do you know about your soil?
soil.soilTypePlaceholder: e.g. Clay-loam, rocky in the upper fields...
soil.autoNote: Don't worry — we'll also pull in public soil data for your area automatically.

water.title: Water Sources
water.subtitle: What water is available on your property?

floraFauna.title: Flora & Fauna
floraFauna.subtitle: What plants and animals are on your land?
floraFauna.floraPlaceholder: Type a species name and press Enter...
floraFauna.faunaPlaceholder: Type a species name and press Enter...
floraFauna.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g. Large population of wild boar, migratory birds in spring...

fire.title: Fire History
fire.subtitle: Has your property been affected by fire?
fire.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g. Southern hillside burned in 2017, regenerating well...

challenges.title: Current Challenges
challenges.subtitle: What challenges does your land face?
challenges.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g. Severe erosion on the north slope during winter rains...

goals.title: Goals for Your Land
goals.subtitle: What's your vision?
goals.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g. Transition to regenerative agriculture within 3 years...

documents.title: Documents & Reports
documents.subtitle: Upload any existing property documents.
documents.dropzone: Drag & drop files here, or click to browse

review.title: Review Your Passport
review.subtitle: Everything look good? You can always edit later.

success.title: Your Land Passport is ready!
success.subtitle: Share your property's profile with anyone using the link below.
success.editLinkHelp: Save this link — it's the only way to edit your passport.

directory.title: Knowledge Commons Directory
directory.subtitle: Explore documented properties and their bioregional context.
directory.empty: No properties yet. Be the first to contribute!

footer.tagline: Building a bioregional knowledge base, one property at a time.
footer.copyright: © {year} Knowledge Commons. Part of the llLibrary ecosystem.
